Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that President Trump donated his "second quarter salary to rebuild military cemeteries" when in fact he donated it to other departments and agencies.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that President Trump did not donate any portion of his salary to rebuild military cemeteries.
Understate: The claim understates the media coverage of President Trump's salary donations by stating that the media ignored every story of him donating his salary, when in fact many media outlets have consistently reported on these donations.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion that President Trump donated his salary to rebuild military cemeteries.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that the media ignored the story of President Trump donating his salary, when in fact it has been reported by many media outlets.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide an alternative explanation for why the media may not have covered the story, other than the assumption that they ignored it.
